Item: I feel free to do whatever I decide to do.
I feel free to make my own choices.
I feel I can decide for myself how to live my life.
I am able to think clearly
I am able to stay focused when I need to.
I am easily able to concentrate when necessary.
I am competent and capable in the activities that are important to me.
Most things I do, I do well.
I am able to perform well and be successful in most things that I do
I do not get easily upset.
I usually maintain my composure.
I am emotionally balanced and even-tempered.
My heart goes out to people who are unhappy.
I feel others’ emotions.
Other people’s misfortunes usually disturb me a great deal.
I easily get caught up in other people’s feelings.
Most of the time I am really interested in what I am doing.
I am almost always engaged and interested in my daily activities.
I feel excited by many of the things I do.
I lead a purposeful and meaningful life.
I feel I have a sense of direction in my life.
My life has a clear sense of purpose.
I feel very optimistic about my future.
My future looks very bright to me.
I am always optimistic about my future.
I generally feel cheerful.
I am happy most of the time.
All things considered, I would describe myself as a happy person.
There are people in my life who really care about me.
I have close and secure relationships.
There are people with whom I can discuss intimate and personal matters.
I receive help and support from others when I need it.
I frequently offer help to others.
I willingly give of my time to others in need.
If a person needs help, I would do almost anything I could to assist.
I tend to bounce back quickly after hard times.
It does not take me long to recover from a stressful event.
I quickly get over and recover from significant life difficulties.
I am accepting of my own flaws and inadequacies.
I can admit my shortcomings without shame or embarrassment.
I can see my own problems and shortcomings without getting distressed by them.
I am accepting of who I am.
I feel that I’m a person of worth.
A lot of things about me are good.
I feel that I have a number of good qualities.
I feel full of energy most of the time.
I generally have a lot of energy.
I generally feel active and vigorous.
